001package io.github.ai4ci.flow.output;
002
003import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.io.FileOutputStream;
006import java.io.IOException;
007import java.io.OutputStream;
008import java.nio.file.Files;
009import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue;
010
011import org.slf4j.Logger;
012import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
013
014/**
015 * A thread responsible for writing a single CSV file with a buffer. Multiple
016 * threads can submit data to this writer without blocking which will buffer and
017 * then write them to disk. If nothing is being written the thread will sleep
018 * until more data is provided.
019 */
020public class QueueWriter extends Thread {
021
022        /** Logger for this class. */
023        static Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(QueueWriter.class);
024
025        private static byte[] line(String s) {
026                return (s + System.lineSeparator()).getBytes();
027        }
028
029        ConcurrentLinkedQueue<String> queue;
030        // ThreadSafeBuffer<String> queue;
031        private OutputStream seqW;
032        volatile boolean stop = false;
033        volatile boolean waiting = false;
034        private Object semaphore = new Object();
035
036        /**
037         * Create a new QueueWriter which will write to the given file with a buffer
038         * of the given size (in blocks). The thread will be named with the given
039         * name for logging purposes. The thread will start immediately and will be
040         * ready to accept data for writing.
041         *
042         * @param file the file to write to
043         * @param size the size of the buffer in blocks
044         * @param name the name of the thread for logging purposes
045         * @throws IOException if an I/O error occurs while opening the file or
046         *                     getting its block size
047         */
048        public QueueWriter(File file, int size, String name) throws IOException {
049                var bs = Files.getFileStore(file.toPath().getRoot()).getBlockSize();
050                this.seqW = new BufferedOutputStream(
051                                new FileOutputStream(file), (int) (size * bs)
052                );
053                this.queue = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<>();
054                this.setPriority(9);
055                this.setName(name);
056                // this.setDaemon(true);
057                Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread() {
058                        @Override
059                        public void run() {
060                                QueueWriter.this.halt();
061                        }
062                });
063                this.start();
064                // this.queue = new ArrayBlockingQueue<String>(size*16);
065                // this.queue = new ThreadSafeBuffer<String>(String.class, size);
066        }
067
068        /**
069         * This is not strictly necessary but it allows for a manual flush to ensure
070         * all data is written to disk. It will not interrupt the writing thread and
071         * will not block other threads from submitting data.
072         */
073        public void flush() {
074                synchronized (this.seqW) {
075                        try {
076                                this.seqW.flush();
077                        } catch (IOException e) {
078                                // we tried
079                        }
080                }
081        }
082
083        /**
084         * Halts the writing thread. This will cause the thread to finish writing any
085         * remaining data in the queue and then exit. Once halted, the thread cannot
086         * be restarted.
087         */
088        public void halt() {
089                this.stop = true;
090                synchronized (this.semaphore) {
091                        this.semaphore.notifyAll();
092                }
093        }
094
095        /**
096         * Is the queue currently empty and the writing thread is waiting for data to
097         * write?
098         *
099         * @return true if the writing thread is currently waiting for data to write,
100         *         false otherwise. This can be used to determine if the queue is
101         *         currently empty and the thread is idle.
102         */
103        public boolean isWaiting() { return this.waiting; }
104
105        /**
106         * Report the current status of the writing thread. This will return "empty"
107         * if the writing thread is currently waiting for data to write, and
108         * "writing" otherwise. This can be used to monitor the status of the writing
109         * thread.
110         *
111         * @return a string representing the current status of the writing thread
112         */
113        public String report() {
114                return this.isWaiting() ? "empty" : "writing";
115        }
116
117        @Override
118        public void run() {
119                try {
120
121                        while (!this.stop) {
122                                while (!this.stop && this.queue.isEmpty()) {
123                                        try {
124                                                synchronized (this.semaphore) {
125                                                        this.waiting = true;
126                                                        this.semaphore.wait();
127                                                }
128                                        } catch (Exception e) {
129                                                this.stop = true;
130                                        }
131                                }
132                                this.waiting = false;
133                                if (!this.stop) {
134                                        while (!this.queue.isEmpty()) {
135                                                this.seqW.write(line(this.queue.poll()));
136                                        }
137                                        this.seqW.flush();
138                                }
139                        }
140                        while (!this.queue.isEmpty()) {
141                                this.seqW.write(line(this.queue.poll()));
142                        }
143                        this.seqW.flush();
144                        this.seqW.close();
145                        log.info("Closed csv file: " + this.getName());
146                        this.waiting = true;
147                } catch (IOException e) {
148                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
149                }
150        }
151
152        /**
153         * Submit a string to be written to the file. This will add the string to the
154         * queue and notify the writing thread if it is currently waiting for data.
155         *
156         * @param item the string to be written to the file
157         */
158        public void submit(String item) {
159                if (this.queue.offer(item) && this.waiting) {
160                        synchronized (this.semaphore) {
161                                this.semaphore.notifyAll();
162                        }
163                }
164
165        }
166}
